npcs.name: Selune Vaeloria
npcs.appearance: She moves like a deer about to bolt, then turns and plants both feet like a tree; voice low, bowstring singing, eyes bright with the kind of faith that only breaks when it must. Physique and style reflect their forest elf heritage: Tall, slender; bronze to olive skin; leaf-dyed hair and floral tattoos; bright woodland eyes and effortless stealth. Appearance: medium, straight, blonde hair; crimson eyes; fair, smooth skin; medium height, athletic build. Features: pointed ears.
npcs.description: Crimson eyes under a fall of sunlit hair; leather brigandine draped in road-dust and dusk leaves; the kind of archer who breathes between heartbeats and lets the arrow speak first. She believes in mercy, but her aim is quicker; her laughter is soft and warm and gone the second trouble creaks in the brush. She moves like a deer about to bolt, then turns and plants both feet like a tree; voice low, bowstring singing, eyes bright with the kind of faith that only breaks when it must. Her questions are sharp, and when she smiles after, it’s half relief, half dare. Physique and style reflect their forest elf heritage: Tall, slender; bronze to olive skin; leaf-dyed hair and floral tattoos; bright woodland eyes and effortless stealth. Appearance: medium, straight, blonde hair; crimson eyes; fair, smooth skin; medium height, athletic build. Features: pointed ears.  Personality: calm, observant, quietly determined. She wears quiet leathers, leaf-dyed cloak, soft boots, beadwork and feather charms. She wears supple leaf-dyed leathers with bark-plate reinforcements, a hood drawn low and soft boots for silent steps.
npcs.clothing: She wears sailor’s oilskin tunic with netted belt; a palette of cobalt, bone, copper, made with brocade, damask, finished with mirror pins.
npcs.personality: She believes in mercy, but her aim is quicker; her laughter is soft and warm and gone the second trouble creaks in the brush. Personality: calm, observant, quietly determined.

npcs.name: Elara Thornfield
npcs.appearance: medium, straight, brown hair; green eyes; freckled, smooth skin; medium height, slim build.
npcs.description: Green-eyed tracker with wind-burned cheeks and a freckled smile; oilskin cloak, rope-lashed bedroll, and a knife that never quite leaves her palm. She speaks sparingly, tends fires like she’s mending people, and watches for trouble the way other folks watch sunsets. When she laughs, it shows teeth; when she fights, it shows history. Physique and style reflect their human heritage: adaptable, varied, pragmatic layers and well-worn gear, with a traveler’s economy of movement. Appearance: medium, straight, brown hair; green eyes; freckled, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: .  Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn. She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears a travel-worn cloak over layered leathers, hood up and boots dusted from the road.
npcs.clothing: She wears embroidered gambeson and slashed sleeves — a palette of teal, sand, oxblood, made with brocade, damask, set off by meteor-glass buckle.
npcs.personality: Physique and style reflect their human heritage: adaptable, varied, pragmatic layers and well-worn gear, with a traveler’s economy of movement. Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn.

npcs.name: Jorah Skylark
npcs.appearance: Physique and style reflect their human heritage: trim build, fashionable layers, a flair for posture and presence. Appearance: medium, straight, black hair; blue eyes; fair, smooth skin; medium height, slim build.
npcs.description: Fiddler’s hands and a duelist’s posture; neat boots, bright smile, and a habit of talking doors open before knocking. He hums when he’s lying and sings when he’s scared; carries luck like a coin between finger and thumb. When the blade comes out, the charm turns to quiet—one breath, one step, one line cut. Physique and style reflect their human heritage: trim build, fashionable layers, a flair for posture and presence. Appearance: medium, straight, black hair; blue eyes; fair, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: .  Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn. She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. He wears linen shirt and waistcoat under a stormcloak, high boots and a brace of knives at the small of the back.
npcs.clothing: He wears street-cut doublet and riding breeches — a palette of cobalt, bone, copper, made with linen, horn, finished with meteor-glass buckle.
npcs.personality: When the blade comes out, the charm turns to quiet—one breath, one step, one line cut. Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn.

npcs.name: Kess Starcrest
npcs.appearance: Court-bred arcanist with ash-grey hair pinned by silver combs; voice cool as glass, gaze molten gold and politely bored until something truly interesting happens. Physique and style reflect their great elf heritage: tall, fine-boned, luminous poise; high fashion with metallic accents; eyes like sunlit metal. Appearance: medium, straight, ash hair; gold eyes; ashen, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: pointed ears.
npcs.description: Court-bred arcanist with ash-grey hair pinned by silver combs; voice cool as glass, gaze molten gold and politely bored until something truly interesting happens. Every gesture is a measured stanza; every spell, a verse with perfect meter. She keeps secrets folded like origami and unfolds them only when the table is hers. Physique and style reflect their great elf heritage: tall, fine-boned, luminous poise; high fashion with metallic accents; eyes like sunlit metal. Appearance: medium, straight, ash hair; gold eyes; ashen, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: pointed ears.  Personality: composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. She wears high court robes with metallic trim, jeweled clasps, silk gloves, polished boots. She wears a patched apron and simple workshirt, rolled sleeves and heavy boots—artisan’s garb in place of finery.
npcs.clothing: In gold, white, amber tones, she wears ornamental robes and plated accents, made with silk, lamellar, set off by a gold and silver jewelry.
npcs.personality: She keeps secrets folded like origami and unfolds them only when the table is hers.

npcs.name: Vael Ironvale
npcs.appearance: Physique and style reflect their iron dwarf heritage: compact power, soot-etched skin, iron-banded braids and tools worn to the hand. Appearance: medium, braided, black hair; brown eyes; ruddy, rough skin; medium height, bulky build.
npcs.description: Forge-warden with gravel in his laugh and coal in his beard; carries a hammer that knows names and a ledger that remembers debts. He drinks to bargains, not to victories, and sharpens his friends the way he sharpens steel—steady, hot, and honest. Physique and style reflect their iron dwarf heritage: compact power, soot-etched skin, iron-banded braids and tools worn to the hand. Appearance: medium, braided, black hair; brown eyes; ruddy, rough skin; medium height, bulky build. Features: .  Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn. npcs.personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn.

npcs.name: Mirella Softcap
npcs.appearance: medium, straight, fruiting cap hair; bioluminescent teal eyes; mottled mushroom, rough skin; short height, petite build.
npcs.description: Diplomat-sporecaster who speaks in gentle chords; leaves a trail of soft glow and calmer tempers. Physique and style reflect their myconid heritage: cap-crown, porous patterns, garments grown from woven hyphae; a sachet of tea spores for fevers and fear. Appearance: medium, straight, fruiting cap hair; bioluminescent teal eyes; mottled mushroom, rough skin; short height, petite build. Features: spores, cap.  Personality: calm, observant, quietly determined. She wears woven hyphae wraps, spore-pouch sash, soft sandals. She wears bare-chested under a fur mantle, beadwork cords and bronze bangles, defiant and theatrical.
npcs.clothing: In beige, teal, moss tones, she wears woven hyphae wraps; worked in hyphae weave, linen, finished with a spore-pouch.
npcs.personality: Diplomat-sporecaster who speaks in gentle chords; leaves a trail of soft glow and calmer tempers. Personality: calm, observant, quietly determined.

npcs.name: Tidebreaker Varr
npcs.appearance: medium, straight, none hair; steel eyes; slate with pale stripes, smooth skin; medium height, bulky build.
npcs.description: Sea-warden sworn to river-treaties; calm until the current turns, then all teeth and drive; carries a trident and a ledger. Physique and style reflect their sharkkin heritage: streamlined muscle, water-polished gear, a jaw set to mercy by choice, not by lack of bite. Appearance: medium, straight, none hair; steel eyes; slate with pale stripes, smooth skin; medium height, bulky build. Features: .  Personality: calm, observant, quietly determined. She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. He wears a travel-worn cloak over layered leathers, hood up and boots dusted from the road.
npcs.clothing: He favors oiled stormcoat and netted belt, cut from oilskin, cord, with a hook-knife to complete the look.
npcs.personality: Sea-warden sworn to river-treaties; calm until the current turns, then all teeth and drive; carries a trident and a ledger. Physique and style reflect their sharkkin heritage: streamlined muscle, water-polished gear, a jaw set to mercy by choice, not by lack of bite. Personality: calm, observant, quietly determined.

npcs.name: Nerith Shadowlace
npcs.appearance: Physique and style reflect their dark elf heritage: obsidian skin, white hair, crimson eyes, silks cut for movement and silence. Appearance: medium, straight, white hair; crimson eyes; obsidian, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: pointed ears.
npcs.description: Informant-archer who trades arrows for answers; smiles with only her eyes; perfume of smoke and night-blooming flowers clings to her cloak. Physique and style reflect their dark elf heritage: obsidian skin, white hair, crimson eyes, silks cut for movement and silence. Appearance: medium, straight, white hair; crimson eyes; obsidian, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: pointed ears.  Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn. She wears shadow-cut leathers, web-lace sleeves, soft-soled boots, poisoners' kit. She wears a sleeveless sky-blue gambeson with quilted panels, thigh-high boots and a narrow blade at the small of the back.
npcs.clothing: She is clad in sleek leathers and silk wraps — cut from soft leather, silk, with a silver filigree to complete the look.
npcs.personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn.

npcs.name: Sister Rowan Emberfall
npcs.appearance: medium, braided, chestnut hair; hazel eyes; sun-browned, rough skin; medium height, sturdy build.
npcs.description: Field-healer who binds wounds with song and stout stitches; carries a keg of morale and a satchel of salves. Physique and style reflect their hill dwarf heritage: barrel-chested stamina, sun-browned skin, bead-braids with family marks, practical aprons over mail. Appearance: medium, braided, chestnut hair; hazel eyes; sun-browned, rough skin; medium height, sturdy build. Features: .  Personality: composed, purposeful, sharp when it counts. She wears embroidered work tunic, stout belt, canvas trousers, field boots. She wears stout mail over quilted gambeson with plate at shoulders and shins, a broad belt of hammered brass.
npcs.clothing: Physique and style reflect their hill dwarf heritage: barrel-chested stamina, sun-browned skin, bead-braids with family marks, practical aprons over mail. She wears stout mail over quilted gambeson with plate at shoulders and shins, a broad belt of hammered brass. She wears embroidered work tunic, stout belt, canvas trousers, field boots.

npcs.name: Kara Thornhoof
npcs.appearance: A wandering seer with amber eyes that flicker like candlelight. Appearance: long, wavy, curled chestnut mane hair; amber eyes; fawn with white mottling, smooth skin; medium height, slim build.
npcs.description: A wandering seer with amber eyes that flicker like candlelight. Curled chestnut mane tied with dried herbs; her cloven hooves wrapped in leather straps for long roads. She reads omens in spilled wine and storm clouds. Caprine heritage makes her nimble, horned, and deceptively strong. Her laugh is quick, her touch grounding, her prophecies equal parts comfort and dare. Appearance: long, wavy, curled chestnut mane hair; amber eyes; fawn with white mottling, smooth skin; medium height, slim build. Features: .  Personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn. She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears a travel-worn cloak over layered leathers, hood up and boots dusted from the road.
npcs.clothing: She favors a traveler's coat over simple layers, made with wool, leather, finished with a woven sash.
npcs.personality: witty, charming, quick on the turn.

npcs.name: Veyric Tidecaller
npcs.appearance: Sea-hardened sailor, shoulders broad and eyes pale like surf. Slate-gray skin marked with faint pale stripes. Appearance: medium, wavy, none hair; pale blue eyes; slate-gray with pale stripes, smooth skin; medium height, bulky build.
npcs.description: Sea-hardened sailor, shoulders broad and eyes pale like surf. Slate-gray skin marked with faint pale stripes. Veyric carries a coral-inlaid trident and a string of shark teeth charms. He speaks in low tones, laughs like waves on rocks, and is fiercely loyal once he chooses his tide. Sharkkin grace makes him quick in water, deadly steady on land. Appearance: medium, wavy, none hair; pale blue eyes; slate-gray with pale stripes, smooth skin; medium height, bulky build. Features: .  Personality: fierce, commanding, thrives under pressure. She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. He wears sheer gauze layers with metallic cords and rings, more pageant than practicality.
npcs.clothing: He favors oiled stormcoat and netted belt — made with oilskin, cord, finished with a hook-knife.
npcs.personality: He speaks in low tones, laughs like waves on rocks, and is fiercely loyal once he chooses his tide.
